document_data.name: Gorx
document_data.mainbody: '''Gorx''' was a [[xorn]] at the [[Fane of the Eye]] under [[Tyar-Besil]] during the [[Elemental Evil]] crisis.
document_data.History: In [[1491 DR]], while in his [[Elemental Plane of Earth|home plane]], Gorx saw a [[gate]] to [[Toril]]. Intrigued, he passed through and arrived in the Fane. There, [[Keltar (individual)|Keltar]], a member of the [[Cult of the Black Earth]], mistook Gorx for an emissary of the elemental lord [[Ogrémoch]]. Taking advantage of this, the xorn enslaved the cultist, saying that Ogrémoch needed tributes to be given to Gorx. However, some adventurers infiltrated the Fane and confronted him.
